name: Stick Basketball Arcade
description:
Stick Basketball ArcadeA 2D Basketball Arcade Game! 🏀

Like arcade games outside, the timer eventually ends

Though one can score as much as possible (and stall as long as possible!)

A Ludum Dare 50 game 🎮

(Note: Playing using  fullscreen mode is recommended!)

How to play

- Shoot as many balls before the timer runs out! 🧺

- Watch out for bonus balls, which give extra time ⏲️

- Click and drag balls to aim 🏀

- Any ball within the left half of the court is grabbable (or reboundable!)
